source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: 3ds Max + Vray: Advanced Architectural Exteriors

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop
visible_instructors.name: Adam

visible_instructors.title: Learn Arch Viz
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training for the Arch Viz Community
visible_instructors.name: Learn Arch

items.headline: Use Vray and other pro tools to take your 3d arch viz projects to the next level -- From Basic to Brilliant in a few hrs
objectives_summary: Use the project files to create an advanced exterior rendering with all the latest tools & techniques.
Add new advanced tools (like Substance Designer) to your workflow and improve the quality of your images.
Dramatically improve your rendering skills

items.title: Learn 2D Game Special Effect Animation in Photoshop
items.headline: The best Game special effects animation course on the market
objectives_summary: Animate a wide array of different game special effects
Understand how to use Photoshop's animation tools
Have a better understanding of game animation

items.title: Blender 2.79 Nature environment creation
items.headline: Discover a complete workflow to create three realistic nature scenes, learn to build assets from scratch with Blender.
objectives_summary: Creation of assets from scratch ( plants, trees, rocks, cliffs, lianas, ivys, etc)
Creation of three complete scenes ( jungle, river, temple )

items.title: Fusion 360 for 3D Printing - Designing with Components
items.headline: Design a multi part model by using components and other powerful tools to design an led lamp that switches on and off.
objectives_summary: Design a 3D printable led tea light that turns on and off.
Feel comfortable tackling multi-part designs by effectively using components and other design tools in Fusion 360.
Take a design from concept to working prototype.

items.title: Game Asset Crash Course - 3D Modeling in Blender and 3D-Coat

visible_instructors.title: Timothy Trankle
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Modeler, FX Artist, and Game Developer
visible_instructors.name: Timothy

items.headline: Learn 3D modeling, texturing, and rendering with Blender and 3D-Coat by creating AAA ready game assets
objectives_summary: Use 3D modeling in Blender to create a practical, real world game asset that you can use in your own creations or expand upon into other game assets.
Make awesome, AAA game assets by utilizing just the right tools and techniques of the software that you need.
Save time and money by creating your own 3D models, quickly and efficiently.

items.title: Video Game Weapon Course : Modeling / Substance Painter 2

visible_instructors.title: Bradley Wascher
visible_instructors.job_title: 3D Environment Artist in Video Game Industry
visible_instructors.name: Bradley

items.headline: Learn how to model, unwrap, and texture weapons for games. Use Maya and Substance Painter 2 to create AAA quality models
objectives_summary: Set up reference images inside of Maya
Create block out meshes and understand their purpose
Build optimized and well thought out high poly models that are rich in details

items.title: Direct and Produce Animation
items.headline: People want to join your project. Learn how to guide them into following your vision for your next Animation.
objectives_summary: Direct and Produce animation with no drawing or animating skills
Cut in half the time it takes to do an animation
Guide people to follow your vision

items.title: Blender 2.79 Dinosaur creation from scratch
items.headline: Discover the very last version of Blender with a complete workflow from modeling to texturing, rigging sculpt animation
objectives_summary: Discover a complete workflow to create a dinosaur from scientific data
Understand the interface and keyboard shortcuts for more efficiency.
Get polygonal modeling, texturing, rigging basics.

items.title: Basics Of Stop Motion Animation Using Canva And OpenShot
items.headline: A Guide to creating basic stop motion animations in Canva And OpenShot
objectives_summary: This Is A Basic Animation For Beginners Using Free Software Course.
Learn the basics of Canva
Learn the basics of OpenShot Video Editor

items.title: UE4: An Advanced Real Time Arch Viz Project

visible_instructors.title: Adam Zollinger
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Artist & Instructor - 3ds Max / V-Ray / Photoshop
visible_instructors.name: Adam

visible_instructors.title: Learn Arch Viz
visible_instructors.job_title: Online training for the Arch Viz Community
visible_instructors.name: Learn Arch

items.headline: Use Unreal Engine to generate photo real stills / animations, architectural walkthroughs and interactive VR experiences
objectives_summary: Take your 3d project into Real Time in minutes
Render photorealistic stills and cinematic animations in real time
Navigate a fully rendered environment with keyboard + mouse or VR headset

items.title: After Effects CC Expressions: Animated Infographics Design

visible_instructors.title: Louay Zambarakji
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing
visible_instructors.name: Louay

items.headline: Learn all about Expressions while Animating Interesting and useful Infographics Designs in Adobe After Effects CC
objectives_summary: Create Animated infographics: line Graphs, Bar Charts and Pie Charts
Understand and Use expressions to help create charts
Use special effects and presets to create graphs

items.title: After Effects CC: Design Professional Video Transitions

visible_instructors.title: Louay Zambarakji
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing
visible_instructors.name: Louay

items.headline: Learn how to Design Professional Video Transitions in After Effects CC and How to use them in Premiere Pro Video Editing
objectives_summary: Understand how Transitions Mattes work
How to implement Transitions in your Video Editing Software
Motion Graphics Techniques to rapidly create your transition

items.title: Create a Game Character: Blender, Substance Painter, Unity
items.headline: Learn to use Blender, Substance Painter, Krita, and Unity to create your own game characters.
objectives_summary: Model and UV Map a 3D character in Blender suitable for game engines
Texture a 3D character in Substance Painter
Rig a character in Blender that will work with the Humanoid Rig system in Unity

items.title: The Ultimate Blender 3D Modeling Guide
items.headline: Learn How to Model 3D Objects in Blender 2.8
objectives_summary: Students will learn the techniques and skills to modeling in Blender 2.8 so that they are able to model whatever objects they want
Students will model 20 different objects and in the process, will learn the modeling skills, techniques and modifiers for modeling
Students will learn how to create 20 different models

items.title: 3D Printing from Zero to Hero in Blender 2.9x - 3D Design
items.headline: Learn to 3D model & 3D Print with the free software Blender - Start 3D printing your imagination in Blender 3D!
objectives_summary: Create unique 3D models for 3D Printing in Blender
Turn your ideas into something real by having them 3D printed
Create 3D models fast and efficiently inside the free software Blender

items.title: Blender Character Rigging For Beginners HD
items.headline: Learn to Rig a 3D Human Character In Blender
objectives_summary: You will learn how to rig a 3D human character in Blender for animations and video games
You will learn how to use Blender software and become proficient with its rigging features
You will understand how bones in blender work for rigging in detail
